title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.8 - Cleaning of retort
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.8 - Cleaning of retort

State Regulations

Upon the completion of the cremation of the remains of a
deceased human being, the interior of the retort shall be thoroughly swept so
as to render the retort reasonably free of all matter. The cremains and other
remains shall be collected for final processing and placed into an individual
container and not commingled with other cremains. The cremation permit shall be
attached to the individual container prior to final
processing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
203.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
